Maximum bandwidth to the elastic public network, measured in Mbps (Mega bit per second). If this value is not specified, then automatically sets it to 5 Mbps.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="EipArgs-description">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/eip.ts#L190">property <b>description</b></a>

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="EipArgs-instanceChargeType">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/eip.ts#L194">property <b>instanceChargeType</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>instanceChargeType?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Elastic IP instance charge type. Valid values are "PrePaid" and "PostPaid". Default to "PostPaid".

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="EipArgs-internetChargeType">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/eip.ts#L198">property <b>internetChargeType</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>internetChargeType?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Internet charge type of the EIP, Valid values are `PayByBandwidth`, `PayByTraffic`. Default to `PayByBandwidth`. From version `1.7.1`, default to `PayByTraffic`. It is only PayByBandwidth when `instanceChargeType` is PrePaid.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="EipArgs-isp">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/eip.ts#L202">property <b>isp</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>isp?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The line type of the Elastic IP instance. Default to `BGP`. Other type of the isp need to open a whitelist.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="EipArgs-name">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/eip.ts#L206">property <b>name</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>name?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The name of the EIP instance. This name can have a string of 2 to 128 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or hyphens, such as "-",".","_", and must not begin or end with a hyphen, and must not begin with http:// or https://.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="EipArgs-period">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/eip.ts#L211">property <b>period</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>period?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The duration that you will buy the resource, in month. It is valid when `instanceChargeType` is `PrePaid`.
Default to 1. Valid values: [1-9, 12, 24, 36]. At present, the provider does not support modify "period" and you can do that via web console.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="EipState-internetChargeType">

Internet charge type of the EIP, Valid values are `PayByBandwidth`, `PayByTraffic`. Default to `PayByBandwidth`. From version `1.7.1`, default to `PayByTraffic`. It is only PayByBandwidth when `instanceChargeType` is PrePaid.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetDisksArgs-tags">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/getDisks.ts#L91">property <b>tags</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>tags?: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined'>undefined</a></span> | {[key: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>]: <span class='kd'><a href='https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/basic-types.html#any'>any</a></span>};</code></pre>

A map of tags assigned to the disks. It must be in the format:
```
data "alicloud.ecs.getDisks" "disksDs" {
tags = {
tagKey1 = "tagValue1",
tagKey2 = "tagValue2"
}
}
```

Disk type. Possible values: `system` and `data`.

A map of tags assigned to the ECS instances. It must be in the format:
```
data "alicloud.ecs.getInstances" "taggedInstances" {
tags = {
tagKey1 = "tagValue1",
tagKey2 = "tagValue2"
}
}
```

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ImageArgs-architecture">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/image.ts#L216">property <b>architecture</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>architecture?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Specifies the architecture of the system disk after you specify a data disk snapshot as the data source of the system disk for creating an image. Valid values: `i386` , Default is `x8664`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ImageArgs-description">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/image.ts#L220">property <b>description</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>description?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The description of the image. It must be 2 to 256 characters in length and must not start with http:// or https://. Default value: null.

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>diskDeviceMappings?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/alicloud/types/input/#ImageDiskDeviceMapping'>ImageDiskDeviceMapping</a>&gt;[]&gt;;</code></pre>

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ImageArgs-force">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/image.ts#L230">property <b>force</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>force?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Indicates whether to force delete the custom image, Default is `false`.
- true：Force deletes the custom image, regardless of whether the image is currently being used by other instances.
- false：Verifies that the image is not currently in use by any other instances before deleting the image.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ImageArgs-imageName">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/image.ts#L234">property <b>imageName</b></a>

The image name. It must be 2 to 128 characters in length, and must begin with a letter or Chinese character (beginning with http:// or https:// is not allowed). It can contain digits, colons (:), underscores (_), or hyphens (-). Default value: null.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ImageArgs-platform">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/image.ts#L243">property <b>platform</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>platform?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Specifies the operating system platform of the system disk after you specify a data disk snapshot as the data source of the system disk for creating an image. Valid values: `CentOS`, `Ubuntu`, `SUSE`, `OpenSUSE`, `RedHat`, `Debian`, `CoreOS`, `Aliyun Linux`, `Windows Server 2003`, `Windows Server 2008`, `Windows Server 2012`, `Windows 7`, Default is `Others Linux`, `Customized Linux`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ImageState-force">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/image.ts#L181">property <b>force</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>force?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Indicates whether to force delete the custom image, Default is `false`.
- true：Force deletes the custom image, regardless of whether the image is currently being used by other instances.
- false：Verifies that the image is not currently in use by any other instances before deleting the image.

The tag value of an image. The value of N ranges from 1 to 20.

<h3 class="pdoc-module-header" id="InstanceArgs" data-link-title="InstanceArgs">
    <a href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L571">
        interface <strong>InstanceArgs</strong>
    </a>
</h3>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kr'>interface</span> <span class='nx'>InstanceArgs</span></code></pre>

The set of arguments for constructing a Instance resource.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-allocatePublicIp">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L577">property <b>allocatePublicIp</b></a>
</h4>

<div class="note note-deprecated">
<i class="fas fa-exclamation-triangle pr-2"></i><strong>DEPRECATED</strong>
Field &#39;allocate_public_ip&#39; has been deprecated from provider version 1.6.1. Setting &#39;internet_max_bandwidth_out&#39; larger than 0 will allocate public ip for instance.
</div>
<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>allocatePublicIp?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

It has been deprecated from version "1.7.0". Setting "internetMaxBandwidthOut" larger than 0 can allocate a public ip address for an instance.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-autoReleaseTime">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L583">property <b>autoReleaseTime</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>autoReleaseTime?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The automatic release time of the `PostPaid` instance.
The time follows the ISO 8601 standard and is in UTC time. Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ. It must be at least half an hour later than the current time and less than 3 years since the current time.
Set it to null can cancel automatic release attribute and the ECS instance will not be released automatically.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-autoRenewPeriod">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L589">property <b>autoRenewPeriod</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>autoRenewPeriod?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Auto renewal period of an instance, in the unit of month. It is valid when `instanceChargeType` is `PrePaid`. Default to 1. Valid value:
- [1, 2, 3, 6, 12] when `periodUnit` in "Month"
- [1, 2, 3] when `periodUnit` in "Week"

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-availabilityZone">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L593">property <b>availabilityZone</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>availabilityZone?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The Zone to start the instance in. It is ignored and will be computed when set `vswitchId`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-creditSpecification">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L597">property <b>creditSpecification</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>creditSpecification?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Performance mode of the t5 burstable instance. Valid values: 'Standard', 'Unlimited'.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-dataDisks">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L601">property <b>dataDisks</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>dataDisks?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/alicloud/types/input/#InstanceDataDisk'>InstanceDataDisk</a>&gt;[]&gt;;</code></pre>

The list of data disks created with instance.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-deletionProtection">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L607">property <b>deletionProtection</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>deletionProtection?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Whether enable the deletion protection or not.
- true: Enable deletion protection.
- false: Disable deletion protection.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-description">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L611">property <b>description</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>description?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The description of the data disk.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-dryRun">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L617">property <b>dryRun</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>dryRun?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Specifies whether to send a dry-run request. Default to false.
- true: Only a dry-run request is sent and no instance is created. The system checks whether the required parameters are set, and validates the request format, service permissions, and available ECS instances. If the validation fails, the corresponding error code is returned. If the validation succeeds, the `DryRunOperation` error code is returned.
- false: A request is sent. If the validation succeeds, the instance is created.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-forceDelete">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L622">property <b>forceDelete</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>forceDelete?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

If it is true, the "PrePaid" instance will be change to "PostPaid" and then deleted forcibly.
However, because of changing instance charge type has CPU core count quota limitation, so strongly recommand that "Don't modify instance charge type frequentlly in one month".

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-hostName">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L627">property <b>hostName</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>hostName?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Host name of the ECS, which is a string of at least two characters. “hostname” cannot start or end with “.” or “-“. In addition, two or more consecutive “.” or “-“ symbols are not allowed. On Windows, the host name can contain a maximum of 15 characters, which can be a combination of uppercase/lowercase letters, numerals, and “-“. The host name cannot contain dots (“.”) or contain only numeric characters. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.
On other OSs such as Linux, the host name can contain a maximum of 30 characters, which can be segments separated by dots (“.”), where each segment can contain uppercase/lowercase letters, numerals, or “_“. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-imageId">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L631">property <b>imageId</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>imageId: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The Image to use for the instance. ECS instance's image can be replaced via changing 'image_id'. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-includeDataDisks">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L635">property <b>includeDataDisks</b></a>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>includeDataDisks?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Whether to change instance disks charge type when changing instance charge type.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-instanceChargeType">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L639">property <b>instanceChargeType</b></a>

Valid values are `PrePaid`, `PostPaid`, The default is `PostPaid`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-instanceName">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L640">property <b>instanceName</b></a>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>instanceName?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>
<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-instanceType">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L644">property <b>instanceType</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>instanceType: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The type of instance to start. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-internetChargeType">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L648">property <b>internetChargeType</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>internetChargeType?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Internet charge type of the instance, Valid values are `PayByBandwidth`, `PayByTraffic`. Default is `PayByTraffic`. At present, 'PrePaid' instance cannot change the value to "PayByBandwidth" from "PayByTraffic".

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-internetMaxBandwidthIn">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L652">property <b>internetMaxBandwidthIn</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>internetMaxBandwidthIn?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Maximum incoming bandwidth from the public network, measured in Mbps (Mega bit per second). Value range: [1, 200]. If this value is not specified, then automatically sets it to 200 Mbps.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-internetMaxBandwidthOut">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L656">property <b>internetMaxBandwidthOut</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>internetMaxBandwidthOut?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Maximum outgoing bandwidth to the public network, measured in Mbps (Mega bit per second). Value range:  [0, 100]. Default to 0 Mbps.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-ioOptimized">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L662">property <b>ioOptimized</b></a>
</h4>

<div class="note note-deprecated">
<i class="fas fa-exclamation-triangle pr-2"></i><strong>DEPRECATED</strong>
Attribute io_optimized has been deprecated on instance resource. All the launched alicloud instances will be IO optimized. Suggest to remove it from your template.
</div>
<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>ioOptimized?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

It has been deprecated on instance resource. All the launched alicloud instances will be I/O optimized.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-isOutdated">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L666">property <b>isOutdated</b></a>

Whether to use outdated instance type. Default to false.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-keyName">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L670">property <b>keyName</b></a>

The name of key pair that can login ECS instance successfully without password. If it is specified, the password would be invalid.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-kmsEncryptedPassword">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L674">property <b>kmsEncryptedPassword</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>kmsEncryptedPassword?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

An KMS encrypts password used to an instance. If the `password` is filled in, this field will be ignored. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-kmsEncryptionContext">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L678">property <b>kmsEncryptionContext</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>kmsEncryptionContext?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;{[key: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>]: <span class='kd'><a href='https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/basic-types.html#any'>any</a></span>}&gt;;</code></pre>

An KMS encryption context used to decrypt `kmsEncryptedPassword` before creating or updating an instance with `kmsEncryptedPassword`. See [Encryption Context](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/42975.htm). It is valid when `kmsEncryptedPassword` is set. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-password">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L682">property <b>password</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>password?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Password to an instance is a string of 8 to 30 characters. It must contain uppercase/lowercase letters and numerals, but cannot contain special symbols. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-period">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L688">property <b>period</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>period?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The duration that you will buy the resource, in month. It is valid when `instanceChargeType` is `PrePaid`. Default to 1. Valid values:
- [1-9, 12, 24, 36, 48, 60] when `periodUnit` in "Month"
- [1-3] when `periodUnit` in "Week"

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-periodUnit">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L692">property <b>periodUnit</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>periodUnit?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The duration unit that you will buy the resource. It is valid when `instanceChargeType` is 'PrePaid'. Valid value: ["Week", "Month"]. Default to "Month".

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-privateIp">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L696">property <b>privateIp</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>privateIp?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Instance private IP address can be specified when you creating new instance. It is valid when `vswitchId` is specified. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-renewalStatus">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L703">property <b>renewalStatus</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>renewalStatus?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Whether to renew an ECS instance automatically or not. It is valid when `instanceChargeType` is `PrePaid`. Default to "Normal". Valid values:
- `AutoRenewal`: Enable auto renewal.
- `Normal`: Disable auto renewal.
- `NotRenewal`: No renewal any longer. After you specify this value, Alibaba Cloud stop sending notification of instance expiry, and only gives a brief reminder on the third day before the instance expiry.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-resourceGroupId">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L707">property <b>resourceGroupId</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>resourceGroupId?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The Id of resource group which the instance belongs.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-roleName">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L711">property <b>roleName</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>roleName?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Instance RAM role name. The name is provided and maintained by RAM. You can use `alicloud.ram.Role` to create a new one.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-securityEnhancementStrategy">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L717">property <b>securityEnhancementStrategy</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>securityEnhancementStrategy?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The security enhancement strategy.
- Active: Enable security enhancement strategy, it only works on system images.
- Deactive: Disable security enhancement strategy, it works on all images.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-securityGroups">

A list of security group ids to associate with.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-spotPriceLimit">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L725">property <b>spotPriceLimit</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>spotPriceLimit?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The hourly price threshold of a instance, and it takes effect only when parameter 'spot_strategy' is 'SpotWithPriceLimit'. Three decimals is allowed at most.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-spotStrategy">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L732">property <b>spotStrategy</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>spotStrategy?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The spot strategy of a Pay-As-You-Go instance, and it takes effect only when parameter `instanceChargeType` is 'PostPaid'. Value range:
- NoSpot: A regular Pay-As-You-Go instance.
- SpotWithPriceLimit: A price threshold for a spot instance
- SpotAsPriceGo: A price that is based on the highest Pay-As-You-Go instance

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-subnetId">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L733">property <b>subnetId</b></a>

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-systemDiskAutoSnapshotPolicyId">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L737">property <b>systemDiskAutoSnapshotPolicyId</b></a>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>systemDiskAutoSnapshotPolicyId?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The ID of the automatic snapshot policy applied to the system disk.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-systemDiskCategory">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L741">property <b>systemDiskCategory</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>systemDiskCategory?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Valid values are `ephemeralSsd`, `cloudEfficiency`, `cloudSsd`, `cloudEssd`, `cloud`. `cloud` only is used to some none I/O optimized instance. Default to `cloudEfficiency`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-systemDiskSize">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L745">property <b>systemDiskSize</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>systemDiskSize?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Size of the system disk, measured in GiB. Value range: [20, 500]. The specified value must be equal to or greater than max{20, Imagesize}. Default value: max{40, ImageSize}. ECS instance's system disk can be reset when replacing system disk. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-tags">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L751">property <b>tags</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>tags?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;{[key: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>]: <span class='kd'><a href='https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/basic-types.html#any'>any</a></span>}&gt;;</code></pre>

A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
- Key: It can be up to 64 characters in length. It cannot begin with "aliyun", "acs:", "http://", or "https://". It cannot be a null string.
- Value: It can be up to 128 characters in length. It cannot begin with "aliyun", "acs:", "http://", or "https://". It can be a null string.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-userData">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L755">property <b>userData</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>userData?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

User-defined data to customize the startup behaviors of an ECS instance and to pass data into an ECS instance. From version 1.60.0, it can be update in-place. If updated, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect. Note: Not all of changes will take effect and it depends on [cloud-init module type](https://cloudinit.readthedocs.io/en/latest/topics/modules.html).

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-volumeTags">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L761">property <b>volumeTags</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>volumeTags?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;{[key: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>]: <span class='kd'><a href='https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/basic-types.html#any'>any</a></span>}&gt;;</code></pre>

A mapping of tags to assign to the devices created by the instance at launch time.
- Key: It can be up to 64 characters in length. It cannot begin with "aliyun", "acs:", "http://", or "https://". It cannot be a null string.
- Value: It can be up to 128 characters in length. It cannot begin with "aliyun", "acs:", "http://", or "https://". It can be a null string.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceArgs-vswitchId">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L765">property <b>vswitchId</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>vswitchId?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The virtual switch ID to launch in VPC. This parameter must be set unless you can create classic network instances. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

<h3 class="pdoc-module-header" id="InstanceState" data-link-title="InstanceState">

        interface <strong>InstanceState</strong>
    </a>
</h3>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kr'>interface</span> <span class='nx'>InstanceState</span></code></pre>

Input properties used for looking up and filtering Instance resources.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-allocatePublicIp">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L369">property <b>allocatePublicIp</b></a>
</h4>

<div class="note note-deprecated">
<i class="fas fa-exclamation-triangle pr-2"></i><strong>DEPRECATED</strong>
Field &#39;allocate_public_ip&#39; has been deprecated from provider version 1.6.1. Setting &#39;internet_max_bandwidth_out&#39; larger than 0 will allocate public ip for instance.
</div>
<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>allocatePublicIp?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

It has been deprecated from version "1.7.0". Setting "internetMaxBandwidthOut" larger than 0 can allocate a public ip address for an instance.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-autoReleaseTime">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L375">property <b>autoReleaseTime</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>autoReleaseTime?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The automatic release time of the `PostPaid` instance.
The time follows the ISO 8601 standard and is in UTC time. Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ. It must be at least half an hour later than the current time and less than 3 years since the current time.
Set it to null can cancel automatic release attribute and the ECS instance will not be released automatically.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-autoRenewPeriod">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L381">property <b>autoRenewPeriod</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>autoRenewPeriod?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Auto renewal period of an instance, in the unit of month. It is valid when `instanceChargeType` is `PrePaid`. Default to 1. Valid value:
- [1, 2, 3, 6, 12] when `periodUnit` in "Month"
- [1, 2, 3] when `periodUnit` in "Week"

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-availabilityZone">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L385">property <b>availabilityZone</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>availabilityZone?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The Zone to start the instance in. It is ignored and will be computed when set `vswitchId`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-creditSpecification">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L389">property <b>creditSpecification</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>creditSpecification?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Performance mode of the t5 burstable instance. Valid values: 'Standard', 'Unlimited'.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-dataDisks">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L393">property <b>dataDisks</b></a>

The list of data disks created with instance.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-deletionProtection">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L399">property <b>deletionProtection</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>deletionProtection?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Whether enable the deletion protection or not.
- true: Enable deletion protection.
- false: Disable deletion protection.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-description">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L403">property <b>description</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>description?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The description of the data disk.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-dryRun">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L409">property <b>dryRun</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>dryRun?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Specifies whether to send a dry-run request. Default to false.
- true: Only a dry-run request is sent and no instance is created. The system checks whether the required parameters are set, and validates the request format, service permissions, and available ECS instances. If the validation fails, the corresponding error code is returned. If the validation succeeds, the `DryRunOperation` error code is returned.
- false: A request is sent. If the validation succeeds, the instance is created.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-forceDelete">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L414">property <b>forceDelete</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>forceDelete?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

If it is true, the "PrePaid" instance will be change to "PostPaid" and then deleted forcibly.
However, because of changing instance charge type has CPU core count quota limitation, so strongly recommand that "Don't modify instance charge type frequentlly in one month".

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-hostName">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L419">property <b>hostName</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>hostName?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Host name of the ECS, which is a string of at least two characters. “hostname” cannot start or end with “.” or “-“. In addition, two or more consecutive “.” or “-“ symbols are not allowed. On Windows, the host name can contain a maximum of 15 characters, which can be a combination of uppercase/lowercase letters, numerals, and “-“. The host name cannot contain dots (“.”) or contain only numeric characters. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.
On other OSs such as Linux, the host name can contain a maximum of 30 characters, which can be segments separated by dots (“.”), where each segment can contain uppercase/lowercase letters, numerals, or “_“. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-imageId">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L423">property <b>imageId</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>imageId?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The Image to use for the instance. ECS instance's image can be replaced via changing 'image_id'. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-includeDataDisks">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L427">property <b>includeDataDisks</b></a>

Whether to change instance disks charge type when changing instance charge type.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-instanceChargeType">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L431">property <b>instanceChargeType</b></a>

Valid values are `PrePaid`, `PostPaid`, The default is `PostPaid`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-instanceName">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L432">property <b>instanceName</b></a>

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-instanceType">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L436">property <b>instanceType</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>instanceType?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The type of instance to start. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-internetChargeType">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L440">property <b>internetChargeType</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>internetChargeType?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Internet charge type of the instance, Valid values are `PayByBandwidth`, `PayByTraffic`. Default is `PayByTraffic`. At present, 'PrePaid' instance cannot change the value to "PayByBandwidth" from "PayByTraffic".

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-internetMaxBandwidthIn">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L444">property <b>internetMaxBandwidthIn</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>internetMaxBandwidthIn?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Maximum incoming bandwidth from the public network, measured in Mbps (Mega bit per second). Value range: [1, 200]. If this value is not specified, then automatically sets it to 200 Mbps.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-internetMaxBandwidthOut">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L448">property <b>internetMaxBandwidthOut</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>internetMaxBandwidthOut?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Maximum outgoing bandwidth to the public network, measured in Mbps (Mega bit per second). Value range:  [0, 100]. Default to 0 Mbps.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-ioOptimized">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L454">property <b>ioOptimized</b></a>
</h4>

<div class="note note-deprecated">
<i class="fas fa-exclamation-triangle pr-2"></i><strong>DEPRECATED</strong>
Attribute io_optimized has been deprecated on instance resource. All the launched alicloud instances will be IO optimized. Suggest to remove it from your template.
</div>
<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>ioOptimized?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

It has been deprecated on instance resource. All the launched alicloud instances will be I/O optimized.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-isOutdated">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L458">property <b>isOutdated</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>isOutdated?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Whether to use outdated instance type. Default to false.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-keyName">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L462">property <b>keyName</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>keyName?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The name of key pair that can login ECS instance successfully without password. If it is specified, the password would be invalid.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-kmsEncryptedPassword">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L466">property <b>kmsEncryptedPassword</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>kmsEncryptedPassword?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

An KMS encrypts password used to an instance. If the `password` is filled in, this field will be ignored. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-kmsEncryptionContext">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L470">property <b>kmsEncryptionContext</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>kmsEncryptionContext?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;{[key: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>]: <span class='kd'><a href='https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/basic-types.html#any'>any</a></span>}&gt;;</code></pre>

An KMS encryption context used to decrypt `kmsEncryptedPassword` before creating or updating an instance with `kmsEncryptedPassword`. See [Encryption Context](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/42975.htm). It is valid when `kmsEncryptedPassword` is set. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-password">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L474">property <b>password</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>password?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Password to an instance is a string of 8 to 30 characters. It must contain uppercase/lowercase letters and numerals, but cannot contain special symbols. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-period">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L480">property <b>period</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>period?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The duration that you will buy the resource, in month. It is valid when `instanceChargeType` is `PrePaid`. Default to 1. Valid values:
- [1-9, 12, 24, 36, 48, 60] when `periodUnit` in "Month"
- [1-3] when `periodUnit` in "Week"

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-periodUnit">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L484">property <b>periodUnit</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>periodUnit?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The duration unit that you will buy the resource. It is valid when `instanceChargeType` is 'PrePaid'. Valid value: ["Week", "Month"]. Default to "Month".

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-privateIp">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L488">property <b>privateIp</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>privateIp?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Instance private IP address can be specified when you creating new instance. It is valid when `vswitchId` is specified. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-publicIp">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L492">property <b>publicIp</b></a>
</h4>

The instance public ip.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-renewalStatus">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L499">property <b>renewalStatus</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>renewalStatus?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Whether to renew an ECS instance automatically or not. It is valid when `instanceChargeType` is `PrePaid`. Default to "Normal". Valid values:
- `AutoRenewal`: Enable auto renewal.
- `Normal`: Disable auto renewal.
- `NotRenewal`: No renewal any longer. After you specify this value, Alibaba Cloud stop sending notification of instance expiry, and only gives a brief reminder on the third day before the instance expiry.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-resourceGroupId">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L503">property <b>resourceGroupId</b></a>

The Id of resource group which the instance belongs.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-roleName">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L507">property <b>roleName</b></a>

Instance RAM role name. The name is provided and maintained by RAM. You can use `alicloud.ram.Role` to create a new one.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-securityEnhancementStrategy">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L513">property <b>securityEnhancementStrategy</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>securityEnhancementStrategy?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The security enhancement strategy.
- Active: Enable security enhancement strategy, it only works on system images.
- Deactive: Disable security enhancement strategy, it works on all images.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-securityGroups">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L517">property <b>securityGroups</b></a>

A list of security group ids to associate with.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-spotPriceLimit">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L521">property <b>spotPriceLimit</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>spotPriceLimit?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The hourly price threshold of a instance, and it takes effect only when parameter 'spot_strategy' is 'SpotWithPriceLimit'. Three decimals is allowed at most.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-spotStrategy">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L528">property <b>spotStrategy</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>spotStrategy?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The spot strategy of a Pay-As-You-Go instance, and it takes effect only when parameter `instanceChargeType` is 'PostPaid'. Value range:
- NoSpot: A regular Pay-As-You-Go instance.
- SpotWithPriceLimit: A price threshold for a spot instance
- SpotAsPriceGo: A price that is based on the highest Pay-As-You-Go instance

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-status">

The instance status.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-systemDiskAutoSnapshotPolicyId">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L537">property <b>systemDiskAutoSnapshotPolicyId</b></a>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>systemDiskAutoSnapshotPolicyId?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-systemDiskCategory">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L541">property <b>systemDiskCategory</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>systemDiskCategory?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Valid values are `ephemeralSsd`, `cloudEfficiency`, `cloudSsd`, `cloudEssd`, `cloud`. `cloud` only is used to some none I/O optimized instance. Default to `cloudEfficiency`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-systemDiskSize">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L545">property <b>systemDiskSize</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>systemDiskSize?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Size of the system disk, measured in GiB. Value range: [20, 500]. The specified value must be equal to or greater than max{20, Imagesize}. Default value: max{40, ImageSize}. ECS instance's system disk can be reset when replacing system disk. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-tags">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L551">property <b>tags</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>tags?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;{[key: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>]: <span class='kd'><a href='https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/basic-types.html#any'>any</a></span>}&gt;;</code></pre>

A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
- Key: It can be up to 64 characters in length. It cannot begin with "aliyun", "acs:", "http://", or "https://". It cannot be a null string.
- Value: It can be up to 128 characters in length. It cannot begin with "aliyun", "acs:", "http://", or "https://". It can be a null string.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-userData">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L555">property <b>userData</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>userData?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

User-defined data to customize the startup behaviors of an ECS instance and to pass data into an ECS instance. From version 1.60.0, it can be update in-place. If updated, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect. Note: Not all of changes will take effect and it depends on [cloud-init module type](https://cloudinit.readthedocs.io/en/latest/topics/modules.html).

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-volumeTags">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L561">property <b>volumeTags</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>volumeTags?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;{[key: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>]: <span class='kd'><a href='https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/basic-types.html#any'>any</a></span>}&gt;;</code></pre>

A mapping of tags to assign to the devices created by the instance at launch time.
- Key: It can be up to 64 characters in length. It cannot begin with "aliyun", "acs:", "http://", or "https://". It cannot be a null string.
- Value: It can be up to 128 characters in length. It cannot begin with "aliyun", "acs:", "http://", or "https://". It can be a null string.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="InstanceState-vswitchId">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/instance.ts#L565">property <b>vswitchId</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>vswitchId?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The virtual switch ID to launch in VPC. This parameter must be set unless you can create classic network instances. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

<h3 class="pdoc-module-header" id="KeyPairArgs" data-link-title="KeyPairArgs">
    <a href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/keyPair.ts#L124">
        interface <strong>KeyPairArgs</strong>
    </a>
</h3>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kr'>interface</span> <span class='nx'>KeyPairArgs</span></code></pre>

The set of arguments for constructing a KeyPair resource.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="KeyPairArgs-keyFile">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/keyPair.ts#L128">property <b>keyFile</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>keyFile?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The name of file to save your new key pair's private key. Strongly suggest you to specified it when you creating key pair, otherwise, you wouldn't get its private key ever.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="KeyPairArgs-keyName">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/keyPair.ts#L132">property <b>keyName</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>keyName?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The key pair's name. It is the only in one Alicloud account.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="KeyPairArgs-keyNamePrefix">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/keyPair.ts#L133">property <b>keyNamePrefix</b></a>

Instance host name.It cannot start or end with a period (.) or a hyphen (-) and it cannot have two or more consecutive periods (.) or hyphens (-).For Windows: The host name can be [2, 15] characters in length. It can contain A-Z, a-z, numbers, periods (.), and hyphens (-). It cannot only contain numbers. For other operating systems: The host name can be [2, 64] characters in length. It can be segments separated by periods (.). It can contain A-Z, a-z, numbers, and hyphens (-).

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LaunchTemplateArgs-spotStrategy">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/launchTemplate.ts#L560">property <b>spotStrategy</b></a>

The spot strategy for a Pay-As-You-Go instance. This parameter is valid and required only when InstanceChargeType is set to PostPaid. Value range:
- NoSpot: Normal Pay-As-You-Go instance.
- SpotWithPriceLimit: Sets the maximum price for a spot instance.
- SpotAsPriceGo: The system automatically calculates the price. The maximum value is the Pay-As-You-Go price.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LaunchTemplateArgs-systemDiskCategory">

The category of the system disk. System disk type. Optional values:
- cloud: Basic cloud disk.
- cloud_efficiency: Ultra cloud disk.
- cloud_ssd: SSD cloud Disks.
- ephemeral_ssd: local SSD Disks
- cloud_essd: ESSD cloud Disks.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LaunchTemplateArgs-tags">

A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
- Key: It can be up to 64 characters in length. It cannot begin with "aliyun", "acs:", "http://", or "https://". It cannot be a null string.
- Value: It can be up to 128 characters in length. It cannot begin with "aliyun", "acs:", "http://", or "https://". It can be a null string.

It can contain A-Z, a-z, numbers, periods (.), and hyphens (-). It cannot only contain numbers. For other operating systems: The host name can be [2, 64] characters in length. It can be segments separated by periods (.). It can contain A-Z, a-z, numbers, and hyphens (-).

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LaunchTemplateState-spotStrategy">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/launchTemplate.ts#L422">property <b>spotStrategy</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>spotStrategy?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The spot strategy for a Pay-As-You-Go instance. This parameter is valid and required only when InstanceChargeType is set to PostPaid. Value range:
- NoSpot: Normal Pay-As-You-Go instance.
- SpotWithPriceLimit: Sets the maximum price for a spot instance.
- SpotAsPriceGo: The system automatically calculates the price. The maximum value is the Pay-As-You-Go price.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LaunchTemplateState-systemDiskCategory">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/launchTemplate.ts#L431">property <b>systemDiskCategory</b></a>

The category of the system disk. System disk type. Optional values:
- cloud: Basic cloud disk.
- cloud_efficiency: Ultra cloud disk.
- cloud_ssd: SSD cloud Disks.
- ephemeral_ssd: local SSD Disks
- cloud_essd: ESSD cloud Disks.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LaunchTemplateState-systemDiskDescription">

System disk description. It cannot begin with http:// or https://.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LaunchTemplateState-systemDiskName">

System disk name. The name is a string of 2 to 128 characters. It must begin with an English or a Chinese character. It can contain A-Z, a-z, Chinese characters, numbers, periods (.), colons (:), underscores (_), and hyphens (-).

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LaunchTemplateState-tags">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/launchTemplate.ts#L449">property <b>tags</b></a>

A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
- Key: It can be up to 64 characters in length. It cannot begin with "aliyun", "acs:", "http://", or "https://". It cannot be a null string.
- Value: It can be up to 128 characters in length. It cannot begin with "aliyun", "acs:", "http://", or "https://". It can be a null string.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="SecurityGroupRuleArgs-cidrIp">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/securityGroupRule.ts#L197">property <b>cidrIp</b></a>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>cidrIp?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The target IP address range. The default value is 0.0.0.0/0 (which means no restriction will be applied). Other supported formats include 10.159.6.18/12. Only IPv4 is supported.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="SecurityGroupRuleArgs-description">

The description of the security group rule. The description can be up to 1 to 512 characters in length. Defaults to null.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="SecurityGroupRuleArgs-ipProtocol">

The protocol. Can be `tcp`, `udp`, `icmp`, `gre` or `all`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="SecurityGroupRuleArgs-nicType">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/ecs/securityGroupRule.ts#L209">property <b>nicType</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>nicType?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>
